review_text: We enjoyed the spacious and comfortable house.
The master bathroom had a bidet which was a big hit with our group. Beds were very comfortable. Good space for socializing.
Great place to stay especially with a group. I would definitely stay here again!

Very nice place! A great inviting, comfortable place for our family to gather. There were 7 of us in the house most hours of the day and we didn’t feel crowded. Loved that games were supplied. Definitely recommend!

We were in the area for a family funeral. The space was very comfortable for my husband, our two daughters, and one boyfriend. The location was convenient, both for us attending the events and for me doing my long run on Sunday morning.
Everyone liked the house, it was really nice. It was perfect for this occasion. Hostess was very friendly and helpful. Definitely would stay here again.

It was a nice stay without any problems.
We are always happy to come back.
Thank you very much!

The house was great! In an awesome location in North Mankato. Easy access to the down town area and yet in a quiet tucked away neighborhood. The house was clean and well kept. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely book again!

Absolutely enjoyed our stay. The place was very homey and had everything we need. It held our family of 7, all adults, very comfortable. A few games were supplied and we had so much fun playing UNO. Took a walk around the residential area and felt very safe. It is only an 8 minute drive to downtown Mankato where we adventured out both nights. I highly recommend Rose Junie's place to anyone! Thank you!
Great communication from start to finish. Excellent location for our needs. Clean and well maintained. We would definitely stay again!
Good amount of space and great to work with.

This was a great space for out of towners to stay while visiting family in Mankato. We were two families sharing the space and appreciated having plenty of room to spread out. Our hosts were very responsive and the attached 2-car garage was a bonus for a winter stay! Would definitely stay again.
Great place with no complaints.
Place was beautiful and roomy! Very close to anything we needed or wanted! Highly recommend!

A fantastically cozy location that helped us feel at home away from home. The five of us were away for a weekend and like to do our own cooking to avoid eating out too often while away and the house was well equipped for this. We did have on issue with the touch screen on the stove however our host was very quick to respond with suggestions on how to fix the issue and when that did not work they personally came out to fix this.
If we return to Mankato there is no doubt this is where we will be staying!
Great host with a lovely home.

Hi Junie,
Your place was amazing! The place was nice neat and quiet. I would recommend this to anyone interested in staying!
Very nice place to stay and had all the amenities you would need. Hosts were very responsive and great!! Highly recommend!
This was an amazing stay and an amazing value. Very nice hosts and very cool stream running through the back yard!
My stay was amazing. Super clean and very cozy.
This was an excellent stay for us. The apartment is very well equipped and extremely clean. I would highly recommend staying here.
Excellent stay. Great location in a neighborhood where it is really quiet and theres sidewalks so you can walk through the area or to downtown. very peaceful and relaxing. felt right at home.
Great place to stay. I will definitely stay again.
My stay was great.

Alex’s place was impeccably clean, beds & linens were top notch & the unit was quiet. I did not do laundry but the washer and dryer were full size. Refrigerator was 3/4 size & easily handled our cold storage items.
One needs to descend approximately 6 steps to reach the unit. This studio is well lit with multiple windows present which allows natural light to enter the apartment.
In summary, we had a lovely stay & would highly recommend this accommodation.

Amazing stay! The studio itself is GORGEOUS, but the outdoor area out back is amazing. The space is super close to downtown and only a few minute drive to Mankato University. Perfect stay and incredible amenities!! Alex was super responsive, kind, and welcoming.

Our stay was perfect! The space was bright, immaculate, attention to detail, absolutely perfect! It was maybe even better than the pictures! Everything was done soooo well! The sunroom was a great place to hang out for a couple quiet hours. Loved our stay and will recommend it to people as they visit our friends in town. Definitely worth the value!

We had a fun weekend at this Airbnb--the space is modern, clean and has a cool design. There is also a full garage that comes with the listing. While it is cozy, you can easily bed at least 5 people there. The little bridge/water ravine/firepit area in the back is a nice relaxing bonus! Alex was attentive and very accommodating helping us with easy check-in and check-out. I definitely recommend for people staying in the Mankato area!!
Great place to stay. Amazing amenities and super clean. Perfect place!
Alex’s place was the perfect location for our skiing trip to Mount Kato! It was extremely clean, cozy, and had everything we needed!We would definitely stay here again!
Greatly enjoyed our stay.
Airbnb was as described and looked exactly like the pictures. There were nice little touches like makeup wipes and micellar water which really was thoughtful.
Alex was very quick to respond to questions and super great to work with. would recommend
Great place!!! Perfect space for the two of us! Clean, modern and peaceful! Everything we needed!! Highly recommend!!
Beautiful place that felt right at home!
Great place to stay

We had a wonderful stay! It was so comfy and cozy and we had everything we needed. Great location also, we were able to get everywhere we needed in a short drive. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone who is visiting the Mankato area!
This was our second stay. It's a comfortable space with everything we need.
Will stay here again if ever in Mankato
Second time coming back to Alex place and I can recommend to anyone, decor and furnishing on top. Very clean, snacks and coffee provided
It was so cozy and everything we could have wanted.
Like a beautiful suite in a luxury hotel only better. So clean and designed for elegant comfort.

This airbnb stood out for its cleanliness and having all the details a traveler could want or need. A little creek in the backyard and the three season porch would make this a fun summer stay. I would seek this one out again!

The stay at Alex's was an excellent experience. The space was exactly as described in the listing - no surprises, other than pleasant ones. It was dark when I arrived but the house was well-lit so I could easily locate the home and the entrance. The lighting inside was very welcoming. Everything was provided and easy to find. As a business traveler, the kitchen space was fantastic and very appreciated, and the bathroom was so clean!
Very classy place!
Alex's home was a perfect location with a beautiful and current vibe. A garage to park in, plenty of space inside, I would recommend this home.
Such a wonderful airbnb. Would definitely stay here again!!! Loved everything about it. The sun room is so nice!!! We came for a dance workshop and it was perfect!!
Very nice place and is exactly as it is pictured! Also Alex was a great host and made it easy to access.

Alex’s place was the perfect stay. Even more beautiful than the pictures and everything was so clean, welcoming, and calming. The outdoor area was a welcomed surprise and was so nice to be able to sit outside on a gorgeous fall Minnesota evening.
Beautiful place, convenient for downtown and relaxing outdoor space makes it a fun and relaxing stay.
It was a great place to stay and we will be recommending the place to family and friends! Next time we visit Mankato, we will be sure to book with Alex.
I travel for work weekly and stay in Airbnbs, due to food allergies so it's nice to be able to prepare food this was one of the nicest Airbnbs I've stayed in. I will definitely stay here again.

The first thing we noticed was the beautiful backyard! Sadly we were only staying one night so we didn’t get to enjoy it. The inside was clean and inviting. The kitchen was stocked with snacks and beverage options. We enjoyed a fresh cup of tea and some snacks immediately after arriving. I will definitely recommend this place to others!
We had everything we needed. The space was clean and comfortable. We loved the backyard with the creek running through. The porch was a great storage to be semi outdoors.
What an adorable home! It was so cozy and everything we could have wanted.

We loved the space! Everything was perfect except for maybe a sponge or scrubbie for dishes. :) Alex recommended Discount Tire for our flat. They were very accommodating and did not charge for the repair.

Nice spot for a one night stay. Everything was new and super clean. The only drawback is the noise coming from the upstairs house. It was just the noise of people walking and using the bathroom, but it was very loud. Luckily it didn’t last into the night or start up early in the morning.

Absolutely perfect place to stay when visiting Minnesota State University. Downtown and campus are very close. Alex is a great host with an incredible space. Easy check in, easy parking, and accurate instructions - great first impression. The space was quiet, comfortable, modern, and accessible. I will definitely stay here again if I’m near Mankato.

We traveled from Houston to Mankato and arrived late and had no problems checking in and had everything we needed to relax after a long travel day. Very clean, comfortable beds with a peaceful backyard to enjoy your morning coffee. Highly recommend and will stay again! One last thing the ….. chargers placed at every bedside was a plus! It’s the little things 😊
I really enjoyed staying at Alex place. The place is immaculately furnished, communication was perfect and we enjoyed our stay. We hope to come back again!
The property was exactly as described - pristine, comfortable and close to everything. If we find ourselves back in Kato we will definitely stay here again!

Great place! Nice neighborhood for walks, easy to find, beautifully renovated and decorated, VERY clean and well maintained! Alex is friendly and kind - even when I misread the directions and parked in his personal garage (whoops). Would recommend this cute place and stay again!
Alex’s place was very clean and crisp. The air conditioner and dehumidifier were a little loud, but they eventually were just white noise.
This was a lovely spot in a quiet neighborhood. It was very comfortable and clean with great amenities. I would definitely stay here again!

Great stay!
Had the amenities needed for a weekend or even longer if needed. Cozy bed and furniture.
Locate close to campus, shopping and food. Cute old town.
We greatly enjoyed our stay! Amazing place - super clean, comfortable, and beautifully remodeled and decorated!
We loved the attention to detail! Alex had a variety of supplies available for use, including snacks in the space. It was so clean and comfortable!

Alex’s place was awesome! It was well equipped, clean, and stylish. It had all the necessary amenities for a quick weekend. Alex was quick to communicate and I would highly recommend this place to anyone!

We had a great stay! Very clean and modern. The host Alex was very nice and accommodating. We will stay there again if available.
Close to town in a nice neighborhood.
Thank you

Alex was extremely responsive and his place is conveniently located, spotlessly clean, and beautifully decorated. Many thoughtful touches like snacks, coffee with creamers, extra blankets, convenient amenities in the bathroom. Beds were very comfortable. Kitchenette had everything we needed. A wonderful stay and would definitely stay again!

The location was quiet, yet very close to lots of restaurants. It has everything you'd need as far as utensils, coffee and tea, and linens. It was very easy to find and easy to access through the private entrance. Alex was very friendly and communicative.
Great stay! Just the right size and what we needed for going to a concert in town!

We had a great stay at Alex's place and enjoyed biking around Mankato. The basement apartment was well done, comfortable and had everything we needed (we didn't do any cooking, so can't speak to the specifics there but it looked like there were supplies). Alex was very helpful, including lending us some tools we needed for our bikes. As expected, there was some inevitable footstep noises that many basements have. We would stay here again.

Loved staying at Alex’s place and will definitely stay again next time we are in Mankato! The space is beautifully decorated and sparkling clean!
Alex was extremely professional and the additional outdoor lounging/fire pit areas by the creek are going to be fabulous!
Great place and highly recommend!
We really enjoyed our stay in Mankato. Alex was very friendly and helpful with places to eat. We were minutes away from lots of things to do. It is an attractive place with lots of amenities.

This is a beautiful Airbnb. It felt like a luxury hotel. Linens were soft, cushions and towels were plush, everything was clean. It looks like a professional designed the interior. In addition to being aesthetically pleasing, the space and location felt safe and cozy. I left recharged!
Best Airbnb I've stayed in, thanks!

Alex’s place has been one of my favorite places to stay so far! It was warm and inviting, VERY clean and well kept, supplies were stocked, and overall just a great experience. As for the host, Alex was super responsive- answering any questions I had and he was great at recommending things to do in the area. This place had everything I needed and more! 10/10 will stay here again and recommend to everyone!! Thank you Alex!
Great place in Mankato for a quick stay! Convenient location and cozy setting.

Beautiful, clean, cozy, and so much more. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and would recommend it to anyone looking to stay in the area. The host was super friendly, helpful, and responsive. The space itself is stunning, spotless, cozy, and had everything I needed. The porch looks out to a ravine and adds a peaceful touch of nature. The private driveway and garage were just an added bonus. I will be staying here whenever I’m in town.
Thank you! Great stay!
Quaint house in a quiet North Mankato location. Very clean and comfy.
Great place to stay
The home is comfortable and inviting. The check in and check out process went smoothly! Looks like the photos, and is a great price!

This house was very cute and everything we needed. Only a 5 minute drive from the Civic Center and all the downtown happenings. It was in a nice neighborhood and a park across the street. For being a pet friendly house it did not look or smell like a pet friendly house. The beds were comfortable. All in all a great place to stay.

The house was nice and well-furnished. There was a bit of an odor, but that’s to be expected in an older home. The bed and bedding were pretty comfortable. I was mostly able to find what I needed—except for a washcloth, oddly.
The location was convenient. It was a bit busy there, but not too bad. There was a railroad track somewhere nearby but it didn’t keep me awake or anything.
The fenced yard was great for a dog!
Karen was very responsive and friendly! I would definitely recommend the house.
Great place in adorable neighborhood!
This house was perfect for business or vacation. Very comfortable stay and great location.
Great house! Cozy feeling
Just perfect all I can say. Easy to communicate, nice people….will go back !

Loved our stay at Karen’s home.
Simply but well-equipped with a comfortable, homey vibe.
Would absolutely stay again and again!
Thank you for hosting us. It was a wonderful respite from the week and allowed my whole family to be together.
Stayed here while out of town on a work trip! The fenced in back yard was awesome for the dog to run around and it was a comfortable place to stay!
Karen was an amazing host and her place truly did feel like home away from home :)

Karen was a very responsive host which I really appreciated after a bad experience in Washington DC last summer. The house was just as represented and very clean. It was in a nice older neighborhood and felt safe and comfortable. Karen checked in several times via text to be sure we got in ok and to see if we had questions or needed anything. We were in Mankato to visit family and will definitely stay again if available.
Karen is a great communicator. She has a cute little house and we loved the location. Our pup enjoyed the back yard. We really appreciate being able to stay there with pets.
She was a great host had a little problem with refrigerator, but she immediately got it fixed as soon as she could. Definitely would come back if in the area.
Had a great visit, best Airbnb we’ve been to in a while. No complaints about the space!
Great place. Beautiful remodeling and decorations

Wonderful! Would stay again. Spacious. Clean 🧼. Nice bed. Enjoyed lounging on the couch—husband even got in a nap on it!. Lots of space for 2 people ..much more than we needed but it was perfect for us. Easy to get around and nice to have a Home to go yo every night. Regret not booking sooner because we missed out on an extra night or 2 there . Responsive host…appreciated efforts to get us checked in.
House was exactly as pictured, very clean and easy to find! Less than 10 minutes from downtown and in a nice part of town
it was a nice house i enjoyed staying there everything was clean and i liked where it was located

Clean, first and foremost! Very comfortable beds and great cotton sheets! Great location! The front door lock worked fine but the door handle was a little funky. Drawbacks: front screen door missing glass panel and piece to hold door open, and no shampoo 🙁 Luckily, my husband brought some along. A nice deep tub and great shower heads - but for older folks, some grab bars would really help😁
All in all a great place to stay when in the Mankato area! (Loved the wood furniture in the master bedroom and dining room!)
Great cozy stay
The house was nicely decorated and the bed we slept in was very comfy!

This was the BEST ever for an AirBnB property! Warm and welcoming as soon as I walked through the door. The home conveyed a sense of ease and comfort in all ways.
There's a walking trail just across the street, beautiful maples in the yard, and a large lot which made it feel private.
Jaci was a great host. A great experience! I look forward to staying again the next time I'm in Mankato.
Jaci’s place is great as always. Would absolutely stay at again. :)
It was a great place to stay, very clean, and just what we needed for a quick trip.

Very cute place, suited what we needed for mom/daughters weekend.

Couch, beds, bedding, towels were comfortable and fresh. Decor in the house is great.
Very cute, quiet and reasonably priced home!
amazing stay! house is beautiful and clean. loved the modern look and vibe. close to downtown!
Great spot, very clean, would stay again!
This place was cute and clean. I would stay here again if back in the area.

My friends and I met in Mankato for some girl time. The location was perfect. The host was very prompt at responding to several text messages to questions we had and I was very impressed by that. The home was very comfortable, clean and smelled fresh and new. The beds were not only super clean and refreshing but exceptionally comfortable. We were only minutes away from restaurants. We had a wonderful time and would recommend this home and host highly.
Very nice home, great location!
Jaci’s place felt like a future home, if they ever decide to sell the place I would hope they come to me first Lol

Several old friends gathered from afar for another friends Celebration of Life. This house met our needs perfectly. Convenient location, neat and clean. One friend had not stayed at an Airbnb before. He agreed it was much better than staying in a hotel!
Very nice place. Enjoyed the stay!!
Very fast to response. Love the home.
Was our first time booking so it was a pleasant, positive experience.
Great place, very clean, responsive hosts, comfy beds, lines and towels. Lovely rental place.
The home was very neat and beautiful. Me and my family loved it so much! Would definitely stay here again!
very clean and comfortable place to stay! We will be back again!
Amazing host and property! Will definitely save this place for future stays in Mankato.
Perfect house and location!
Dylan’s place is in a great location at the top of Lookout Drive and incredibly easy to find and access. It’s newly updated and comfortable. The price was unbeatable. Would definitely stay again!

We loved our stay at Dylan’s North Mankato house! My favorite surprise was the morning sunrise over the river valley. Wonderful view from their huge living room windows. The house is newly renovated and beautiful. Very clean and comfortable. Dylan was a great host. Communicated well and was responsive to all our questions. The house has easy access to downtown Mankato and yet is in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. Our kids loved that we could walk to a park that is just down the street. We will definitely book again if we are in the area!
Highly recommend staying here! Awesome little house, so cozy, clean, and well decorated. Comfy beds too! We will be looking this place up next time we’re in Mankato.
Great little house would stay there again if we stay in the area
A great stay close to lower north Mankato. Would recommend for north Mankato accommodations!
Great place to stay. Kitchen was well stocked. Many places to eat within 10 minutes. Quiet neighborhood.

Dylan’s renovated home was beautiful and modern! We felt right at home from the moment we opened the door. We enjoyed the space and comfortable sofa and beds! Kitchen had all the pots and pans we could need while making dinner for our daughter and her roommate that attend MSU! We were a quick drive to anywhere in town. We would definitely stay here again when visiting Mankato! Thank you!
Far better than a hotel room
Dylan's place was very comfortable, stylish and well appointed. Quick access to Mankato and other surrounding areas. Would definitely rent from Dylan again.
Perfect stay clean, quiet, and comfortable. Would stay again without hesitation.
Nicely furnished, clean and very comfortable. We would stay again.

Great place to stay at for a weekend in Mankato! For me, it was the pricing. Beats a crappy hotel. We brought food to cook and he ahead all the pots and pans we needed!
Mankato is small, so you can get anywhere within 10 mins. Going to a Mav game? 5 mins from DT.
Great place to stay. newly updated. easy access and a host that was very easy to work with. I would definitely stay here again.

This stay was great! We had booked this stay rather last minute to avoid some nasty winter weather, and Dylan was accommodating and allowed us entry into the home early. My husband and I were both impressed at how nice everything was inside. Everything was clean and new in regards to kitchen appliances and items in the kitchen, which is not something that is normal in most of the bnb's we have stayed at before. The location was nice and private, although off a main road so it was easy to get to. Beds were comfortable and we had just about everything we needed.

BEAUTIFUL home! Wonderful place to stay for a ladies' night in! Couch was comfy and blankets/pillows were cozy! Kitchen had everything we needed! Comfortable beds with extra pillows/blankets available! Highly recommend!
Perfect for our that weekend. We would stay there again.
It was a nice place. We would stay there again. Ali communicated promptly to any questions we asked.
Great location for our family to celebrate our daughter’s graduation from college.
Nice for a short stay.
Ali was great to work with on our last minute trip. Will stay again next time in town if available.
Very nice home!
Very nice house. Ali was very responsive.
Great little spot in Mankato about 10 minutes from downtown.
Great spot to stay with lots of space. we enjoyed our stay.

The house is spacious and bright. It fit our family of 6 very comfortably.
Toy room was a hit with our little kids.
Will stay here again😊.
awesome experience!
Ali’s place fit our needs why we were in the area for work. Bed was very comfortable. We enjoyed the two couch’s big TV and fireplace.
The house was comfortable and relaxing. My husband booked this for a fun girl's weekend and it was just what we needed!
Great host and comforting stay! Would recommend!!
This was a very relaxing place to spend a long weekend. We very much enjoyed our stay here and would happily stay again if we're in the area.
Great stay

This was the best place we could’ve stayed while in Minnesota! The kids playroom was amazing to have with two littles. We loved the comfort of the couches and the fireplace, and the bedrooms were cozy! This will definitely be our go to place for our future MN trips.

Easy check in. Felt right at home. Games available which were apart of our every night! Very clean space. A great price for the location and the size of the house. Would stay here again if needing an air bnb in Mankato!

Such a lovely, comfortable home!!! The beds were so comfortable, the sheets so soft!! Bathrooms were roomy and stocked with really nice towels. The gas fireplace was lovely. Would definitely stay again!!!!

We had a great one-night stay for a basketball tournament. The moms enjoyed the space while the boys played video games. We loved the close proximity to fast food as well as a yummy Mexican restaurant down the road.
Our boys preferred this to our normal hotel stays!
thank you for sharing your home with us!

Ali's place is about a 10 minute drive to downtown Mankato. Three bedrooms with comfortable beds. The space is perfect if you're looking for a quiet neighborhood to sleep in. Ali reached out ahead of time and explained all instructions and expectations very clearly. We would definitely stay here again!

Great cozy place just as described! Ali was super accommodating and responsive to messages. We loved the quiet neighborhood. We just had 3 adults this trip but seemed kid friendly so if I’m ever back in the area with my kids, I would definitely book this!
Super cozy and lots of space! The bathrooms and bedrooms were organized and the fireplace in the living room was a great touch
Very nice place in a quiet area
Ali was a great host. We would definitely stay at the spot again

We had a fantastic stay with my sisters and our husbands while in town visiting other family. With six adults, it never felt too crowded. The layout of the house is very nice, and appears to be very family-friendly as well. (I wouldn't hesitate to come back with our kids sometime!) The kitchen is pretty well stocked, and having two bathrooms was a huge bonus. I highly recommend this house!
Excellent place. Very beautiful house and very clean. I recommend that place to everyone. I hope soon we will back.
Great place for us to stay. I was there for work. And it was perfect for us. Very clean and comfortable.
Great place and location. Would definitely recommend!

Thank you for everything!!!!
This place is AMAZING!
Book it asap is you want to have the best place.
I am so thankful i choose this place and I’ll be back for sure!
Thank you Ali, you made it easy.

Highly recommended, very comfortable, clean and nice area.
Thanks for everything!!!
I will be back for sure.

Ali was a wonderful host! The place felt just like home for our family to visit the area. The house was clean, welcoming and wonderfully located in North Mankato. She was very adaptable and responsive to our needs, perfect for our family trip! This place is perfect with kiddos, with a nice play area and many different toys for different ages! We would gladly stay here again!

This Cozy Getaway Duplex is really great! Nice and clean and very close to coffee: Starbucks and Caribou as well as good food: Culver's and Chipotle. This worked out really well for our group of 5 that needed to stay in Mankato for a retreat. Ali is also a very responsive host and did everything to make this a great stay for us. Thanks!

This is a really great property. We made a point to stay here because it looked very clean and new, and it was even better than the pictures. Communication was spot on and clear, and getting into the property was very easy. 5 stars all around!

The hosts were very communicative and easy to work with! We really enjoyed our stay. The place was clean and there was plenty of space for everyone! Two of the bedrooms have very large closets which were super helpful for keeping our luggage out of the way! We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

The place was perfect. 5 ladies having belated mother's day weekend away from life. The home is beautiful- we have nothing bad to say at all. We loved the small patio with the pond in the back. There were deer out there both nights, it was gorgeous and fun to watch. I have rented and stayed at a lot of rentals over the past few years, they all have differences. Bring paper supplies, especially garbage bags. Some houses supply these items, some do not. Check out was super easy. I would definitely recommend. Thank you!

We booked this for a 3 week work trip stay. It is a brand new condo. We stayed with 6 adults comfortably. Everything was very clean, and equipped with everything we needed. The hosts were also very responsive! Highly recommend!
Sherry was super nice and commutative. House was super clean. Definitely a kid friendly place, not a whole lot for kiddos to mess up!
Very nice space, easy checkin and lots of options for sleeping! Will definitely be back
Just as described, the place was perfect for a quick stop on our way to Yellowstone. Thanks, Sherry!
We had a wonderful stay! Great location - plenty of room.
Nice place, 5 stars, highly recommend !
Sherry's Place was a great stay. Clean and welcoming, with a nice back patio area for relaxing! Would definitely recommend if your looking for a nice quite place!
Great little home in a nice neighborhood! Close to things and easy to access.

Sherry was very helpful from the beginning - with reservation, multiple questions and responsiveness. Loved the basement family room and bar area - perfect for family gathering and socializing. House was a comfortable temperature, clean and organized. I felt most all my needs were met - except backup garbage bags and toilet paper (I had to go on a hunt to find more.) I would recommend to other families looking to find an economical gathering space to visit with your MSU student when you need more than just a place to sleep.
Our stay at the residence was great! Everything was as described, and Sherry had great communication with us.
Great place!
great location in Mankato. we had all we needed. and it was spacious. Sherry was very responsive and proactive in reaching out to ua

This was the 3rd time Sherry has hosted our family. Great location, and great communication with us. Sherry warned me ahead of time that the thermostat was acting up, so when it became an issue, she came over and it was fixed right away. Thanks Sherry! See you this fall again!

I contacted Sherry several times before our arrival. She was very friendly and always quick to respond and very helpful to answer my questions! The house was just what we expected. We enjoyed the back patio too. The neighborhood was very nice and quiet. The house was well furnished. There were 5 of us girls and we enjoyed our time in the house very much! There was plenty of space for each of us to have our own area. The beds were very comfy! We attended an annual conference in Mankato and we all talked about renting again next year! Thank you Sherry!
Great experience and everything we wanted and needed in the house. I would recommend highly!
Great place
awesome stay
These accommodations were exactly as described and pictured. Plenty of room. Clean. Comfortable.

Sherry’s place was just what we were looking for. We all enjoyed our stay and would stay here again. We had plenty of room upstairs but really enjoyed the basement. Sherry was very prompt in responding before arriving and our day of departure. I strongly recommend one look at her house if you are coming to the Mankato area.
Loved it
nice place

Great location peaceful and private. Plenty of space for everyone we had staying with us. The house had everything we needed for our stay. Great communication and Sherry was easy to deal with. The only criticism we have was the kitchen floor, windows and blinds could have been cleaned better.

This was a really nice place, had everything we needed. The basement was a very comfortable place to hang out together. The furniture was comfortable. We watched movies and played games and it was great. We wouldn't hesitate to book it again when we are in the area.
The house was close to everything and in a nice quiet neighborhood
This location was even nicer in person. It worked perfect for our family with easy check-in, and a great family living area.
Would stay again
She worked through an issue with us and resolved it to our satisfaction. Good communicator. Excellent host. We will stay again!
Sherry was a great host and her place was just as described. Would stay again!
The house was perfect for a quick getaway and was very easy/flexible host, would definitely come stay again!
Very spacious, cute home with lots of room for everyone to sleep!
that was lit. 10/10 would recommend
Came into town for a wedding. Great place for our family. Clean and comfortable. We will likely be back!
Cute and cozy is exactly right. With a lot of space!!
Great place for our family to have our own space while in Mankato for graduation.
Everything was perfect for us.
Nice stay!

Thanks for the hospitality! This home made our Thanksgiving holiday possible. We were extremely comfortable, had lots of space. Convenient location allowed our daughter to easily visit. Sherry was a great host with fast communication.
The next time we are in the area, we wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. Thanks, Sherry!
Beautiful, clean home. Much more spacious than we expected: couches are comfortable to sleep on. Could easily sleep 2-3 more than advertised.
Great space for our family to all meet up and stay over night.

They place was wonderful for 3 adult student coming out to for extended education.
The house was clean, easy instructions.
